Message: Master was such a kind person.

He not only travels
the world lifting the Curse,

but he also said he’d help
save Cerberus.

She waits on the summit,
concealed inside the cursed
lightning storm.
It’s dangerous to go by myself,
so I’m lucky to have Master’s help.

But, I can’t just keep
relying on other people...

I gotta get stronger so I can
at least protect Cerberus.
